Title: Ellia Ravenmane: Revenge
Description:
Your "rival" has appeared again. Ellia Ravenmane has been avoiding her duties on the island, instead focusing on personal training, with the intent to defeat you in battle.

"I will destroy $n," she said.

I have honored her request for a rematch, but I will be keeping a close eye on her. Her motives may be shifting in a dangerous direction.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Ellia Ravenmane at Dome Balrissa.
PortraitGiverText: Ellia has returned, and she's determined to defeat her rival.
